name: Winter Magic (dungeon)
description:
Winter Magic by Luke Ryan Herbert

A DUNELEC GAME DECEMBER 2021

Made for Chio for the Secret Santa Jam 2021

If you are using a Windows PC then the EXE version is recommended 

-HOW TO PLAY-

You must defend the magical tree in the middle of the level. This tree keeps the winter magic alive, the power that you the green gnome controls. Evil snow golems are heading for the tree in an attempt to freeze and rid it of its powers. The Magic Tree has 200 magic points once gone you will get a game over. You can cast magic on the tree to restore magic points or cast magic towards snow golems to melt them.

Use the Z key to cast magic

Arrow keys to move 

F11 to go Full Screen

ESC to exit Full Screen

-ITEMS-

Presents - Presents give you a nice little bonus to your overall score

Winter Stars- Sometimes a winter star will appear which when touched will return the 

Magic Tree back to 200 Magic
